title: Workplace pressure
prayerSummary: Pray for government and company leaders to prioritize the importance of taking care of their workers.
Pray that non-Christians interested in the gospel would have the opportunity and energy to pursue Christ.
Pray for Christians to have wisdom to balance the demands of work with family, church, and rest.
